title: Olli Immonen
text:
Olli Immonen (born 12 February 1986) is a member of the <a href="Finnish%20Parliament">Finnish Parliament</a> for the <a href="Finns%20Party">Finns Party</a> and a former chairman of the nationalist organization <a href="Suomen%20Sisu">Suomen Sisu</a>.
Immonen was born in <a href="Nivala">Nivala</a>, and received national attention in July 2015 after writing a controversial anti-<a href="multicultural">multicultural</a> text on his <a href="Facebook">Facebook</a> page.
